s: Borax (sodium tetraborate) is a naturally occurring mineral. Boraxo is a brand name for the powdered hand cleaner which is borax and powdered soap (it used by be marketed in cake soap form); 20 Mule Team Borax is a laundry additive, household cleaner and water softener (no phosphates or chlorine).
